text: And to God belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth that is He owns all of that among which also are the misguided one and the rightly guided one leading astray whomever He will and guiding whomever He will that He may requite those who do evil for what they have done by way of idolatry and otherwise and reward those who are virtuous by their affirmation of God’s Oneness and other acts of obedience with the best reward namely Paradise.
